data.name: Extreme Rules
data.rules:
Timing begins with control of Link on the Overworld.  Timing ends the instant Link holds up the Triforce in Gannon's room, or upon gaining control in your final room after entering Gannon's room earlier.

No Glitches (including, but not limited to re-entering dungeons to unlock doors, block/ladder clips, screen/map wraps, roocorder, using up+A to keep your Bait after using it, item duplication)
No Swords
No Extra Hearts
No Potions
No Rings
No Boomerangs
No Blue Candle
No Magic Book
No Magic Key
No Power Bracelet
All Maps/Compasses
Must Obtain Both Bomb Upgrades
Must Obtain Silver Arrow
No Killing Overworld Enemies
Must Kill Every Boss/Miniboss (Lanmola, Moldorm, Patra, Anything That Ends a Dungeon)
Must Visit Every Dungeon Room
Run Ends at Gannon (or on control gain in your final room after entering Gannon's room earlier)

All runs must begin from system reset or power cycle.  Beginning from RETRY, SAVE, or CONTINUE is not permitted.
